lead_paragraph: Doug Peterson, the attorney general of Nebraska, said he would challenge the constitutionality of the state’s new law replacing the death penalty with life imprisonment.

headline.print_headline: Nebraska: Challenge to Repeal of the Death Penalty
headline.main: Nebraska: Challenge to Repeal of the Death Penalty

snippet: Doug Peterson, the attorney general of Nebraska, said he would challenge the constitutionality of the state’s new law replacing the death penalty with life imprisonment.
abstract: Nebraska's Atty Gen Doug Peterson vows to challenge constitutionality of state's new law repealing capital punishment.
